meal.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
meal.instructions: Cook pasta, brown beef, add sauce, and simmer.
meal.orderReview: Rich and flavorful. Perfect for a family dinner.

meal.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
meal.instructions: Grill chicken, toss with lettuce, croutons, and Caesar dressing.
meal.orderReview: Fresh and crisp with generous chicken slices.

meal.name: Pancakes
meal.instructions: Mix batter and cook on a griddle until golden brown.
meal.orderReview: Soft, fluffy and best with maple syrup.

meal.name: Beef Tacos
meal.instructions: Cook beef with seasoning and serve in taco shells with toppings.
meal.orderReview: Crispy tacos with perfectly seasoned beef.

meal.name: Avocado Toast
meal.instructions: Toast bread and spread mashed avocado on top.
meal.orderReview: Healthy and filling, ideal for a light breakfast.

meal.name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
meal.instructions: Butter bread, add cheese, and grill until golden.
meal.orderReview: Classic comfort food done just right.

meal.name: Teriyaki Chicken
meal.instructions: Marinate chicken in teriyaki sauce and cook until done.
meal.orderReview: Sweet and savory. Very well-balanced flavor.

meal.name: Veggie Stir-Fry
meal.instructions: Stir-fry mixed vegetables in soy sauce and sesame oil.
meal.orderReview: Fresh and crunchy. Light and healthy option.

meal.name: Margarita Pizza
meal.instructions: Top pizza dough with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and basil. Bake.
meal.orderReview: Thin crust, fresh toppings. Excellent taste.

meal.name: Tomato Soup
meal.instructions: Simmer tomatoes with onions and blend until smooth.
meal.orderReview: Warm and hearty, perfect with breadsticks.

meal.name: Omelette
meal.instructions: Beat eggs, cook in skillet, and fold with fillings.
meal.orderReview: Quick and satisfying, loaded with flavor.

meal.name: Chili Con Carne
meal.instructions: Cook ground beef with beans, tomatoes, and spices.
meal.orderReview: Spicy and filling, great for dinner.

meal.name: Shrimp Fried Rice
meal.instructions: Stir-fry shrimp with rice, vegetables, and soy sauce.
meal.orderReview: Well cooked shrimp with a great umami kick.

meal.name: Greek Salad
meal.instructions: Mix vegetables, olives, and feta cheese. Drizzle with olive oil.
meal.orderReview: Crunchy and refreshing, perfect with grilled chicken.

meal.name: French Toast
meal.instructions: Dip bread in egg mixture and fry until golden brown.
meal.orderReview: Golden and crispy, lightly sweet and buttery.

meal.name: Fish Tacos
meal.instructions: Cook seasoned fish and serve in tortillas with toppings.
meal.orderReview: Light and crispy fish, great with lime.

meal.name: Caprese Salad
meal.instructions: Layer tomato slices with mozzarella and basil. Drizzle with olive oil.
meal.orderReview: Simple, fresh, and elegant.

meal.name: Chicken Curry
meal.instructions: Simmer chicken in curry sauce until cooked through.
meal.orderReview: Authentic Indian flavor, rich and spicy.

meal.name: Sushi Rolls
meal.instructions: Roll sushi rice and fillings in nori, slice, and serve.
meal.orderReview: Fresh and light, good variety of fillings.

meal.name: Mac and Cheese
meal.instructions: Cook pasta and mix with cheese sauce.
meal.orderReview: Authentic Indian flavor, rich and spicy.
